nodes.text: The TT-16B Master Powertech was a type of Mandalorian armor used by both Mandalorians and other hired professionals alike during both Cold War and the Galactic War. The highly violent Mandalorian Clan Chieftain, Mavrix Varad, used the helmet of this armor while some non-Mandalorians such as thugs hired by Skavak also used the helmet design before being killed by the Voidhound on Taris.
